pageProduct.name: Thompson's Ultra C 1000mg 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Ultra C 1000 Sustained release Vitamin C formula to support immune system health and reduce common cold duration.

Thompson's Ultra C 1000 is a sustained release Vitamin C complex that relieves symptoms of common colds and flu including sneezing, coughing and a sore throat. It also helps relieve symptoms of mild upper respiratory tract infections.
Vitamin C supports general health & wellbeing and wound healing in healthy individuals and is an antioxidant that decreases free radical damage to body cells.

Size: 60tabs

Oil-Free?: Yes

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

KEY FEATURES

• Supports immune system health
• Supports vitamin C levels in the body
• Antioxidant, reduces free radicals formed in the body
• Reduce symptoms of common cold
• Reduces & relieves sneezing, cough and runny nose
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly

Warnings

Not to be used in children under two years of age without medical advice. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains:
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 200mg
Calcium ascorbate dihydrate 477.97mg
equiv. Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 394.89mg
equiv. calcium 47.09mg
Sodium ascorbate 450mg
equiv. Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 400mg
Zinc Ascorbate 6.99mg
equiv. Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 5.11mg
equiv. zinc 1mg
Total equiv. Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 1000mg
Citrus Bioflavonoids extract 60mg
Rosa canina (Rose Hip) ext. 20.83mg
derived from dry fruit 124.98mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap. Recycle glass bottle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
